BasicInfo.short: Tangler is an internet messaging tool with embedding and integration functionality that enables real-time discussions anywhere on the web.

Products.name: Tangler
Products.description: Tangler addresses the problems facing the current 5 million discussion forums found on the web: outdated technology and far too much

Products.name: TanglerLive
Products.description: TanglerLive was added to CrunchBase in 2011
